biotools.summary: Web-based tool for the quantification of qPCR data using standard curve approach and QC-based decision support system in a high-throughput setting. It deals with all the issues of qPCR related calculations from data consistency, pipetting errors, standard curve parameters, individual sample efficiencies/inhibition, range of quantification and normalization to one or several reference genes. In this way it enables robust quality controlled quantification of nucleic acids.
